name: Chunk 0: Folder Initialization (V4 - Google Sheets) v8 (Dec 24 at 00:22:05)

nodes.name: Manual Trigger - Run Once
nodes.notes: V4: Run this workflow ONCE to create all 37 folders and set n8n variables automatically. Safe to re-run - checks if folders exist before creating.

parameters.jsCode:
// V4: Define all folders as array for loop processing

const rootFolderName = 'AMA_Documents';

const folderConfig = {
  root: rootFolderName,
  staging: '_Staging',
  parents: [
    { name: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', varPrefix: 'OBJEKT' },
    { name: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', varPrefix: 'WIRT' },
    { name: 'RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', varPrefix: 'RECHT' },
    { name: 'SONSTIGES', varPrefix: 'SONST' }
  ],
  subfolders: [
    // OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '01_Projektbeschreibung', varName: 'FOLDER_01_PROJEKTBESCHREIBUNG' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '02_Kaufvertrag', varName: 'FOLDER_02_KAUFVERTRAG' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '03_Grundbuchauszug', varName: 'FOLDER_03_GRUNDBUCHAUSZUG' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '04_Eintragungsbewilligungen', varName: 'FOLDER_04_EINTRAGUNGSBEWILLIGUNGEN' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '05_Bodenrichtwert', varName: 'FOLDER_05_BODENRICHTWERT' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '06_Baulastenverzeichnis', varName: 'FOLDER_06_BAULASTENVERZEICHNIS' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '07_Altlastenkataster', varName: 'FOLDER_07_ALTLASTENKATASTER' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '08_Baugrundgutachten', varName: 'FOLDER_08_BAUGRUNDGUTACHTEN' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '09_Lageplan', varName: 'FOLDER_09_LAGEPLAN' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '10_Bautraegerkalkulation_DIN276', varName: 'FOLDER_10_BAUTRAEGERKALKULATION' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '15_Flaechenberechnung_DIN277', varName: 'FOLDER_15_FLAECHENBERECHNUNG' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '16_GU_Werkvertraege', varName: 'FOLDER_16_GU_WERKVERTRAEGE' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '17_Bauzeichnungen', varName: 'FOLDER_17_BAUZEICHNUNGEN' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '18_Baugenehmigung', varName: 'FOLDER_18_BAUGENEHMIGUNG' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '22_Gutachterauftrag', varName: 'FOLDER_22_GUTACHTERAUFTRAG' },
    // WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '11_Verkaufspreise', varName: 'FOLDER_11_VERKAUFSPREISE' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '12_Bauzeitenplan_Liquiditaet', varName: 'FOLDER_12_BAUZEITENPLAN' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '13_Vertriebsweg', varName: 'FOLDER_13_VERTRIEBSWEG' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '14_Bau_Ausstattungsbeschreibung', varName: 'FOLDER_14_AUSSTATTUNG' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '19_Teilungserklaerung', varName: 'FOLDER_19_TEILUNGSERKLAERUNG' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '20_Versicherungen', varName: 'FOLDER_20_VERSICHERUNGEN' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '21_Muster_Verkaufsvertrag', varName: 'FOLDER_21_MUSTER_VERKAUFSVERTRAG' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '23_Umsatzsteuervoranmeldung', varName: 'FOLDER_23_USTVA' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '24_BWA', varName: 'FOLDER_24_BWA' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '25_Jahresabschluss', varName: 'FOLDER_25_JAHRESABSCHLUSS' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '26_Finanzierungsbestaetigung', varName: 'FOLDER_26_FINANZIERUNGSBESTAETIGUNG' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '27_Darlehensvertrag', varName: 'FOLDER_27_DARLEHENSVERTRAG' },
    // RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN
    { parent: 'RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '28_Gesellschaftsvertrag', varName: 'FOLDER_28_GESELLSCHAFTSVERTRAG' },
    { parent: 'RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '29_Handelsregisterauszug', varName: 'FOLDER_29_HANDELSREGISTERAUSZUG' },
    { parent: 'RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '30_Gewerbeanmeldung', varName: 'FOLDER_30_GEWERBEANMELDUNG' },
    { parent: 'RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '31_Steuer_ID', varName: 'FOLDER_31_STEUER_ID' },
    { parent: 'RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '32_Freistellungsbescheinigung', varName: 'FOLDER_32_FREISTELLUNGSBESCHEINIGUNG' },
    { parent: 'RECHTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '33_Vollmachten', varName: 'FOLDER_33_VOLLMACHTEN' },
    // SONSTIGES
    { parent: 'SONSTIGES', name: '34_Korrespondenz', varName: 'FOLDER_34_KORRESPONDENZ' },
    { parent: 'SONSTIGES', name: '35_Sonstiges_Allgemein', varName: 'FOLDER_35_SONSTIGES_ALLGEMEIN' },
    { parent: 'SONSTIGES', name: '36_Exit_Strategie', varName: 'FOLDER_36_EXIT_STRATEGIE' },
    { parent: 'SONSTIGES', name: '37_Others', varName: 'FOLDER_37_OTHERS' },
    { parent: 'SONSTIGES', name: '38_Unknowns', varName: 'FOLDER_38_UNKNOWNS' },
    // V4: _Archive subfolders for document versioning
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '01_Projektbeschreibung/_Archive', varName: 'FOLDER_01_ARCHIVE' },
    { parent: 'OBJEKTUNTERLAGEN', name: '03_Grundbuchauszug/_Archive', varName: 'FOLDER_03_ARCHIVE' },
    { parent: 'WIRTSCHAFTLICHE_UNTERLAGEN', name: '10_Bautraegerkalkulation_DIN276/_Archive', varName: 'FOLDER_10_ARCHIVE' },
    { parent: 'SONSTIGES', name: '36_Exit_Strategie/_Archive', varName: 'FOLDER_36_ARCHIVE' }
  ]
};

// Store for collecting folder IDs
const createdFolders = {
  root: null,
  staging: null,
  parents: {},
  subfolders: {}
};

return [{ json: { folderConfig, createdFolders } }];

nodes.name: Define Folder Structure
nodes.notes: V4: Defines all folders as arrays for loop processing. 41 subfolders (37 main + 4 archive) + 4 parents + staging + root = 47 total.

nodes.name: Create Root Folder
nodes.notes: Creates 'Eugene_Documents' root folder in My Drive.

nodes.name: Prepare Parent Folders
nodes.notes: Prepares 5 parent folders (4 categories + staging) for loop creation.

nodes.name: Loop Parents
nodes.notes: Loops through parent folders one at a time.

nodes.name: Create Parent Folder
nodes.notes: Creates each parent folder in root.

nodes.name: Prepare Subfolders
nodes.notes: Collects parent IDs and prepares 37 subfolders for creation.

nodes.name: Loop Subfolders
nodes.notes: Loops through 37 subfolders one at a time.

nodes.name: Create Subfolder
nodes.notes: Creates each subfolder in its parent folder.

nodes.name: Collect Folder IDs
nodes.notes: V4: Collects all folder IDs and prepares variables for n8n API.

nodes.name: Write Folder IDs to Sheet
nodes.notes: Appends folder IDs to Google Sheet

nodes.name: List All Folders
nodes.notes: Lists ONLY folders within AMA_Documents (scoped to root folder ID). Recursive=true gets all subfolders. NOT searching entire My Drive.
